featured.text: It is estimated that more than 33 million acres of Amazonian Rainforest disappear every year.

definition.zh_def: 亞馬遜的；與亞馬遜雨林或其居民有關的
definition.en_def: Relating to the Amazon rainforest or its inhabitants.
definition.example: The Amazonian tribes have a deep understanding of the forest's ecosystem.
